description:
11.82 epx
Apply the EPX magnification filter which is designed for pixel art.

It accepts the following option:

n.description: Set the scaling dimension: 2 for 2xEPX, 3 for 3xEPX. Default is 3.

name: epx

parameters.description: Set the scaling dimension: 2 for 2xEPX, 3 for 3xEPX. Default is 3.
parameters.name: n

source:
11.82 epx

Apply the EPX magnification filter which is designed for pixel art.

It accepts the following option:

n

Set the scaling dimension: 2 for 2xEPX, 3 for 3xEPX. Default is 3.
